ca.bitjutsu.kloutacular.v1
Class KloutScoreManager

java.lang.Object
  ca.bitjutsu.kloutacular.v1.KloutScoreManager

public class KloutScoreManager
extends java.lang.Object

KloutScoreManager fetches, stores, caches, and returns Klout scores for users. The standard usage pattern is as follows:

KloutScoreManager mKloutMan = KloutScoreManager.getInstance(API_KEY);
mKloutMan.addOnScoreUpdatedListener(new KloutScoreManager.OnScoreUpdatedListener() {
  public void onReceive(KloutScore k) {
    //Do stuff with the received KloutScore
  }
});
mKloutMan.requestKlout("bitjutsu");

Author:
Adam Carruthers (adam.carruthers@bitjutsu.ca)

requestTopics

public void requestTopics(java.lang.String screenName,
                          boolean forceRequery)
Request a user's top topics. Beware: the API will not always return the same number of topics.

Parameters:
screenName - the user to request topics for
forceRequery - force a refresh of the user's topics

requestUser

public void requestUser(java.lang.String screenName)
Convenience method for requestUser(String, boolean).

Parameters:
screenName - the user who we want user information about

requestUser

public void requestUser(java.lang.String screenName,
                        boolean forceRequery)
Requests a user object from the Klout API. A user object includes the score, score breakdown (amplification, network, true reach), class, class id, class description, user description, 1- and 5-day deltas, and the slope of the score graph.

Parameters:
screenName - the user who we want user information about
forceRequery - force a refresh of the user's information
